description:
Trevor and Damon are both straight... mostly. They both prefer girls but have had some same-sex experience in the past. So, I thought it would be fun to hook them up and see how things went.
It's pretty unusual for a straight boy, but Trevor loves taking it up the ass. He's extremely anal and you can see by the intense look on his face that he enjoys getting fucked.
Damon was a little apprehensive about the whole thing at first. Because of that, the chemistry between the two of them didn't really kick in immediately. But things heated up as they got more comfortable with each other and the situation. In the end, Damon gives Trevor's ass a good plowing and Trevor shoots a big load all over Damon's chest.
title: Trevor & Damon
